publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-961# Karen Whitefield: Landfill at Greengairs-That the Parliament recognises the sense of frustration felt by the people of Greengairs following the recent announcement that yet another landfill site is to be opened near to their village; believes that there must be changes made to planning law to ensure that the views of communities are more effectively taken into consideration during the planning process, both at the time of application and following the approval of any applications; welcomes the recent announcement by the First Minister that an environmental justice fund will be established to assist communities such as Greengairs, and believes that representatives from communities such as Greengairs must be involved in the process of designing this fund.
